title: 进不了服务器，就我进不了！！
author: Tommer
txt_content: /14.199.122.30:56663 lost connection: Internal Exception: net.minecraft.util.io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: An internal error occured.
